ygData.subject: Re: Freeport Cleric Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: NO offense and honestly not to jump your case, but I had to read your message 5 times before I got the general idea of what you are talking about. I reread all
ygData.messageBody:
NO offense and honestly not to jump your case, but I had to read your
message 5 times before I got the general idea of what you are talking about.
I reread all your old messages and honestly you're darn near impossible to
understand. I think all he and all of us were requesting is for you to
proofread and make your "ramble" a little more readable.

_____________________
RokleM
ICQ (39931165)

www.destruction.org
roklem@...
www.roklem.com
roklem@...
www.mad-skillz.com
roklem@...
